# Project Goal
Build a CLI tool that analyzes PRD and spec documents to map capabilities.

## Modules
- Document ingestion
- Capability taxonomy mapping
- Registry comparison
- Definition generation
- Execution planning

## Technical Scope
This CLI tool will run locally and process JSON/YAML registries.

## Process
Steps include analysis, comparison, and generation workflows.

## Non-functional Requirements
- Reliability
- Clear error messages
